content: Someone's coming to my house to replace my laptop screen this afternoon. Depending when they show up, it's possible this could interfere with our scheduled SDC call. If I don't show up within 5 minutes of scheduled start time, then I guess we're cancelled.
Repair person is scheduled to arrive 5 minutes before the call. I've Skyped Brian P. the details to kick things off, but I don't know if he's going to attend today.
We will be having our regular questionnaire call today. I was slow getting the call schedule up. Same connection information as usual - https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/696476549
Note that going forward (after today) we'll be switching to HL7's FreeConferenceCall solution.
I'm trying to get a sense of who will be able to attend today's call given the holiday in the U.S. Please give a thumbs-up if you plan to attend. (5pm Eastern)
Given the lack of responses, I'm going to cancel today's call. Happy American Thanksgiving :)
:+1:
I can't get into the call scheduler to cancel today's call, but I'm not going to be able to get to a place where I can run it either.
So I'm afraid it is cancelled. Talk to you next week
As a reminder, no call today
Sorry all. I ended up cancelling at the last minute. I put up a cancellation notice, but just realized I did it on the wrong gotomeeting number. I apologize for any time I cost you as a result.
Reminder - no call today
(deleted)
No new tracker items and no specific topics identified, so we'll cancel today's structured data capture/questionnaire call. Enjoy your extra hour :)
There will be a call today, but no calls for the 3 weeks following (I'll be in transit or off-line for the following weeks).

@Lloyd McKenzie I forgot to ask you last week. I have reorganized FHIR-I meeting minutes by year.
image.png
Do you want me to reorganize SDC meeting minutes the same way?
That would be awesome
Note that we will have a call today
As a reminder, we are having a FHIR-I Questionnaire call today at 5 Eastern. Call details: https://zoom.us/j/8583747934
Not on the connectathon channel I guess.
Pass code is 265790
For future calls, use this link: https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/8583747934?pwd=VnZiWFZsNm1TSk5QWmZlbVJyQVZGdz09
